name: IGMC_2015 Submission
description:
Just a prototype, so not too much to do just yet, there's also a couple of bugs...

Keyboard Shortcuts: You can use the 'R' and 'H' keys on your keyboard to toggle between the 'Harvesters' and 'Residences' tabs, and the '1' and '2' keys to pick which building in the list to place.

Originally made for IGMC 2015.
